title: All of You
description: She’s in love with her best friend…Hannah Cooper’s friends think she’s picky. And okay, maybe she’s a little picky, but that’s because no one adds up to Logan Daniels. He’s her best friend and she’s been in love with him for as long as she can remember.The only problem? He’s not exactly dating material.ALL OF YOU is a standalone friends to lovers, slow burn, vacation romance. This New Adult/Contemporary Romance is best-suited for readers ages 18+.
author: Jody Morse
